translations: （Squires）人名；（西）斯基雷斯；（英、瑞典）斯夸尔斯

sentences.sentence: He contrived an eager, ingratiating smile, which he bestowed on Mr. Squires.
sentences.translation: 他装出一副殷勤、讨好的笑脸，并把它投向史奎尔斯先生。

sentences.sentence: "It's fundamental to the business model of publishers," John Squires, the interim managing director of the consortium, said last month.
sentences.translation: 这家联合会的暂代执行总监John Squires上个月表示，“对出版商的商业模式而言，这是基础性的。”
